verbose_text: Host cells develop the OAS / RNase L [2 '-5'-oligoadenylate synthetase (OAS)/ribonuclease L] system to degrade cellular and viral RNA, and/or the OASL / RIG-I (2 '-5'-OAS like / retinoic acid inducible protein I) system to enhance RIG-I-mediated IFN induction, thus providing the first line of defense against viral infection.
evidence: OASL/RIG-I (2'-5'-OAS like/retinoic acid inducible protein I) system to enhance RIG-I-mediated IFN
